meanings.definition: Emit a short, sharp sound or series of sounds.
meanings.sent1: The old car parps loudly when it starts.
meanings.sent2: The horn on the bicycle parps to alert others.
meanings.sent3: The goose parps comically as it waddles around the farm.
meanings.sent4: The alarm clock parps, waking me up abruptly.
meanings.sent5: The toy trumpet parps cheerfully at the birthday party.

meanings.definition: A short, sharp sound or series of sounds.
meanings.sent1: I heard the parps of a distant car horn.
meanings.sent2: The parps of the fireworks filled the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The parps of the rubber duck in the bathtub made me giggle.
meanings.sent4: The parps of the popcorn machine signaled movie time.
meanings.sent5: The parps of the old record player added a nostalgic touch to the room.
